definition: housing for electronic instruments, as radio or television, to give moral or emotional strength to
details:
noun
- housing for electronic instruments, as radio or television
= synonyms: cabinet
- an ornamental scroll-shaped bracket (especially one used to support a wall fixture)
= example: an ornamental scroll-shaped bracket (especially one used to support a wall fixture)
- a scientific instrument consisting of displays and an input device that an operator can use to monitor and control a system (especially a computer system)
- a small table fixed to a wall or designed to stand against a wall
= synonyms: console table
verb
- to give moral or emotional strength to
= synonyms: comfort
